target = <Wrapper.wrapper_manage.WrapperManage object at 0x000001EA1F3AFF08>

    @then('check smart config pairing result')
    def check_smart_pairing_result(target):
        """
        - Narrative:
            check smart config pairing result
        """
        i = 1
        paired_light_info = []
        logger.info("check smart config pairing result")
        # get lights from config file
        lamps = target.config_para['lamps'].copy()
        e = target.ui.home_page.get_light_icon(i)
        time.sleep(5)
        # check if ota icon exists
        logger.info("check if ota icon exits")
        for ota_index in range(60):
            if target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('id', target.ui.home_page.OTA_ICON):
                time.sleep(10)
                # logger.info("#####################################################################################")
                # logger.info("ota index : " + str(ota_index))
                # logger.info("#####################################################################################")
            else:
                break
            if target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('id', target.ui.home_page.OTA_ERROR_ICON):
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                logger.info("ERROR : OTA fail after pairing!")
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                assert False, "OTA fail!"
    
        # check if light icon exist
        if target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('xpath+id', e):
            while target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('xpath+id', e):
                # go to light settings page to get light info
                target.ui.home_page.click_light_icon(i)
                time.sleep(2)
                target.ui.home_page.click_light_settings()
    
                if target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('id', target.ui.light_settings_page.UPGRADING_MESSAGE):
                    # lamp setting page screen shot
                    target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                    # go back to home page
                    target.ui.light_settings_page.go_back_to_home()
                    time.sleep(2)
                    # home page screen shot
                    target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                    logger.info("====================================================================================")
                    logger.info("ERROR : UI error, lamp is upgrading, but there is no pbOTA icon in home page!")
                    logger.info("====================================================================================")
                    target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                    assert False, "UI error, lamp is upgrading, but there is no pbOTA icon in home page"
                # click light model and get light info
                target.ui.light_settings_page.click_light_model()
                light_info = target.ui.light_info_page.get_light_info()
                time.sleep(2)
    
                bl_delete_lamp = True
                # add config lamp info
                for lamp_name in list(lamps):
                    if lamps[lamp_name][0] == light_info['MacAddr']:
                        # go back to light setting page
                        target.ui.light_info_page.go_back_from_model()
    
                        # change light_name
                        target.ui.light_settings_page.change_light_name(lamp_name)
                        logger.info("change light name to " + lamp_name)
                        time.sleep(2)
                        light_info['LampName'] = lamp_name
                        paired_light_info.append(light_info)
    
                        # go back to home page
                        target.ui.light_settings_page.go_back_to_home()
    
                        # update icon index
                        i += 1
                        e = target.ui.home_page.get_light_icon(i)
                        logger.info(lamp_name + " : " + str(e))
                        bl_delete_lamp = False
                        lamps.pop(lamp_name)
                if bl_delete_lamp:
                    # go back to lamp setting page
                    target.ui.light_info_page.go_back_from_model()
                    time.sleep(2)
                    # delete lamp
                    target.ui.light_settings_page.click_delete_light()
                    target.ui.light_settings_page.ok_delete_light()
                    # do not update icon index
                    e = target.ui.home_page.get_light_icon(i)
                    logger.info("delete lamp" + e)
    
            logger.info(str(i - 1) + " light icon showed in App scream!")
            logger.info(paired_light_info)
    
            if len(lamps) != 0:
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                logger.info("ERROR : Smart config pairing light fail : " + str(lamps))
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                assert False, "smart config pairing light fail : " + str(lamps)
        else:
            logger.info("====================================================================================")
            logger.info("ERROR : No light showed in App scream! No light is found!")
            logger.info("====================================================================================")
            target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
>           assert False, "smart config pairing light fail, no light is found"
E           AssertionError: smart config pairing light fail, no light is found
